title: Tray, 1830–60
medium: Porcelain with overglaze decoration in gold
creditline: Gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: For the miniature tea set composed of the following pieces, 1920-19-52 to -57. Oval, with concave cutouts on two diagonal axes. High convex rim, with beading in gold: flat bottom bordered with conventional flowers, foliage and tendrils.
